channel.title: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?
channel.description:
Well, i hade crated a stall for thieving but now i dont know how to make it give cash out to players when u click on it please any body help me!!!!!!!!!
Thank you! :P

item.title: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Create a method and make the object call on the method.

item.title: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?

psycotix shut up… you blocked me aswell , i don’t think anyone would care if you blocked them. my supidity!!! i told him how to do it the easy way. how the fk will this work?

if(playerLevel[#Skill#] >= 1){ setAnimation(614); sendMessage("You thief 650 Coins from the stall with your stealthy skills.); addSkillXP(350, #Skill#); addItem(995, 650); } it doesn’t even say what the object is, idiot, that could be a fuking crate for all the server knows…

item.title: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?
item.dc:creator: @4you111 4you111
item.description:
@4you111 wrote:

[quote=“4you111, post:3, topic:274362”][quote author=Psycotix link=topic=362501.msg2754890#msg2754890 date=1240146335]

if(playerLevel[#Skill#] >= #Level#){ setAnimation(#ID#); sendMessage("#Message#); addSkillXP(#Amount#, #Skill#); addItem(#ID#, #Amount#); }

Here I just wrote it up in Notepad, it should work and you can modify it how you want.

But if you would want it to do a animation, send a message, add XP, and a item, you could use this:

if(playerLevel[#Skill#] >= 1){ setAnimation(614); sendMessage("You thief 650 Coins from the stall with your stealthy skills.); addSkillXP(350, #Skill#); addItem(995, 650); }
[/quote]

where do u add that to, i men which notpad[/quote]

lol can u do it for me please cuse am confused here is clinet.java

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KQHX6XDS

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?

item.title: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Psycotix, post:2, topic:274362”] if(playerLevel[#Skill#] >= #Level#){ setAnimation(#ID#); sendMessage("#Message#); addSkillXP(#Amount#, #Skill#); addItem(#ID#, #Amount#); }

Here I just wrote it up in Notepad, it should work and you can modify it how you want.

But if you would want it to do a animation, send a message, add XP, and a item, you could use this:

if(playerLevel[#Skill#] >= 1){ setAnimation(614); sendMessage("You thief 650 Coins from the stall with your stealthy skills.); addSkillXP(350, #Skill#); addItem(995, 650); }[/quote] you need to use cases or it wont be for a theiving stall.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add thiving abilty to a stall?
